s.text: Explainer plans to offer $100 to any reporter who can show her that James Carville made a legally enforceable offer.
Explainer plans to offer $100 to any reporter who can show her that James Carville made a legally enforceable offer.
If you have gained no benefit and I have incurred no cost, and it's a non-business situation, the judge will probably say it was unreasonable for me to take you seriously.
